  <script src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-2.2.3.min.js" integrity="sha256-a23g1Nt4dtEYOj7bR+vTu7+T8VP13humZFBJNIYoEJo=" crossorigin="anonymous"></script> 
  <script type="text/javascript" src="js/jquery.sb.js"></script> 
  <script type="text/javascript" src="js/jquery.bpopup.min.js"></script> 
  <script src="js/main.js" type="text/javascript"></script> 
  <script>
            var url = "codec_packs";	
			var reviewPath = "write_a_review.php?f="+url+"_reviews.htm";

		  ;(function($) {
		         // DOM Ready
		        $(function() {
		
		            // Binding a click event
		            // From jQuery v.1.7.0 use .on() instead of .bind()
		            $('#my-button').bind('click', function(e) {
					var path = $(this).attr("href");
		                // Prevents the default action to be triggered. 
		                e.preventDefault();
		    		$('#pContent iframe').css("min-height",430);
		                // Triggering bPopup when click event is fired
		                $('#element_to_pop_up').bPopup({
		                    speed: 350,
			            transition: 'slideDown',
			            modalClose: true,
			            content:'iframe',
			            contentContainer:'#pContent',
                    		    loadUrl:path,
                    		    closeClass: 'b-close',
				    iframeAttr: 'height="430" width="570"'
				    });
				
		            });
		            $('#writeAReview').bind('click', function(e) {
			        // Prevents the default action to be triggered. 
			        e.preventDefault();

			        // Triggering bPopup when click event is fired
			        $('#element_to_pop_up').bPopup({
			            speed: 350,
			            transition: 'slideDown',
			            modalClose: true,
			            content:'iframe',
			            contentContainer:'#pContent',
				    loadUrl: reviewPath,
				    closeClass: 'b-close',
				    iframeAttr: 'height="450" width="570"'	    
				    });
				
			
			    });
				        
		
		        });
                       })(jQuery);
                    </script> 
  <script>
			
                    	var urlG = "";
                    	var idG = "";
			var reviewPathG = "guides/leave_a_comment.php?f="+urlG+"&id="+idG;
			var reportPathG = "report_it.php?f="+urlG+".htm&address="+"/codec_packs.htm";
			
		  ;(function($) {
		         // DOM Ready
		        $(function() {
		
		            // Binding a click event
		            // From jQuery v.1.7.0 use .on() instead of .bind()
		             $('#writeAReview').bind('click', function(e) {
			        // Prevents the default action to be triggered. 
			        e.preventDefault();
				// Triggering bPopup when click event is fired
			        $('#element_to_pop_up').bPopup({
			            speed: 350,
			            transition: 'slideDown',
			            modalClose: true,
			            content:'iframe',
			            contentContainer:'#pContent',
				    loadUrl: reviewPathG,
				    closeClass: 'b-close',
				    iframeAttr: 'height="480" width="570"'	    
				    });
			        
				
			
			    });
			    $('#writeAReviewBot').bind('click', function(e) {
			        // Prevents the default action to be triggered. 
			        e.preventDefault();
				// Triggering bPopup when click event is fired
			        $('#element_to_pop_up').bPopup({
			            speed: 350,
			            transition: 'slideDown',
			            modalClose: true,
			            content:'iframe',
			            contentContainer:'#pContent',
				    loadUrl: reviewPathG,
				    closeClass: 'b-close',
				    iframeAttr: 'height="480" width="570"'	    
				    });
			        
				
			
			    });
			    
			    $('#reportButton').bind('click', function(e) {
			        // Prevents the default action to be triggered. 
			        e.preventDefault();
				// Triggering bPopup when click event is fired
			        $('#element_to_pop_up').bPopup({
			            speed: 350,
			            transition: 'slideDown',
			            modalClose: true,
			            content:'iframe',
			            contentContainer:'#pContent',
				    loadUrl: reportPathG,
				    closeClass: 'b-close',
				    iframeAttr: 'height="430" width="570"'	    
				    });
			        
				
			
			    });
				       
		        });
                       })(jQuery);
</script> 
  <script type="text/javascript">

            $(document).ready(function() {

                $('a.view-reply').click(function(){

                    $(this).next().slideToggle('slow');

                    return false;

                });

                $('form.sortOptions').bind('mouseenter mouseleave', function() {

                    $(this).toggleClass('hover');

                    $('div:eq(0)', this).toggleClass('hover');

                    var elSize = $(this).hasClass('hover') ? $('a', this).size() : 1;

                    $(this).stop(true, false).animate({ height: elSize * ($('a', this).height() + 2) }, 300);

                });

                $("form.sortOptions a").click(function(){

                    var currForm = $("form.sortOptions a").parent();

                    currForm = currForm[0];

                    var filterValue = $(this).attr('href').substring(1);

                    currForm.elements[0].value = filterValue;

                    if (currForm.elements[0].value) {

                        var formAction = 'codec_packs';

                        formAction = formAction.replace(/(.*)-(shareware|freeware)/g, '$1');

                        if (filterValue == 'freeware' || filterValue == 'shareware') {

                            formAction += '-' + filterValue;

                        }

                        currForm.action = formAction + '.htm';

                        currForm.submit();

                    }

                    return false;

                });

                $("a.open-review-reply-form").click(function(){

                    $("form#"+$(this).attr("name")).toggle(400);

                    return false;

                });

                $(".submit-review-reply").click(function(){

                    if ($(this).attr('form').elements[0].value.length <= 0) {

                        alert("Please type in your name or nickname.");

                        return false;

                    }

                    if ($(this).attr('form').elements[2].value.length < 5) {

                        alert ("Your comment is too short, it should be at least 5 characters long.");

                        return false;

                    }

                    if ($(this).attr('form').elements[3].value.length <= 0) {

                        alert ("In order to prevent spam answer the question.");

                        return false;

                    }

                    if ($(this).attr('form').elements[1].value.length <= 0) {

                        if (!confirm("If you do not provide your e-mail address we will not be able to contact you.")) {

                            return false;

                        }

                    }

                    else {

                        if (! /^([A-Za-z0-9_\-\.])+\@([A-Za-z0-9_\-\.])+\.([A-Za-z]{2,4})$/.test($(this).attr('form').elements[1].value)) {

                            alert ('Wrong e-mail address, please check.');

                            return false;

                        }

                    }

                    return true;

                });

                $("a.open-review-comments").click(function(){

                    $("#commentsWrapperFor"+$(this).attr('href').substring(1)).toggle(400);

                    return false;

                });

                $("a.like-review-link").click(function() {
					console.log('Review Like -> button clicked');
					
					var x = $(this).attr('href').substring(1);
					var element = $(this).parent().find('p');
                    $("input#likeReviewField").val(x);

					$.get( "like_review.php?id="+x , function( data ) {
						console.log('Review Like -> response: '+ data);
						if (data != -1) {
							element.html('( '+ data +' people like it)');
						}
					});

                    return false;

                });

                

                
            });

            

            function switchClass(el) {

                var elId = el.id;

                if (elId == 'newsTab') {

                    el.className = 'showNewsActive';

                    document.getElementById('reviewsTab').className = 'showReviewsInactive';

                    document.getElementById('news').style.display = 'block';

                    document.getElementById('reviews').style.display = 'none';

                }

                if (elId == 'reviewsTab') {

                    el.className = 'showReviewsActive';

                    document.getElementById('newsTab').className = 'showNewsInactive';

                    document.getElementById('news').style.display = 'none';

                    document.getElementById('reviews').style.display = 'block';

                }

                return false;

            }

            function submitFilterForm(sl) {

                var fa = sl.form.action;

                if (sl.options[sl.selectedIndex].value == 'shareware' || sl.options[sl.selectedIndex].value == 'freeware') {

                    fa = fa.replace(/(http:\/\/www.free-codecs.com\/)(.+)(-.+).htm$/, '$1$2-'+sl.options[sl.selectedIndex].value+'.htm');

                }

                else {

                    fa = fa.replace(/(http:\/\/www.free-codecs.com\/)(.+)(-.+).htm$/, '$1$2.htm');

                }

                sl.form.action = fa;

                sl.form.submit();

            }

            function verify(f) {

                var errors = '';

                if (f.nume.value.length < 3) {

                    errors += "Please type in your name. It should be at least 3 characters long.\n";

                } else if (f.nume.value.match(/[^\w .]/)) {

                    errors += "Field name may contain only letters, spaces, digits and underscore\n";

                }

                if (f.comentariu.value.length < 10) {

                    errors += "Review should be at least 10 characters long\n";

                }

                if (errors.length > 0) {

                    alert (errors);

                    return false;

                }

                return true;

            }

        </script> 
  <script type="text/javascript">
//ScrollNavigation.js
function scrollFunction() {
	
	$('#searchFieldSticky').fadeOut(0);
	if ($(window).scrollTop() > 45) {
		$('#mainNavbar').css('position','fixed');
	        $('#mainNavbar').css('top',0);
		$('.circle.social').fadeIn(0);
		$('#mainNavbar').addClass('scrolled');
	    }
	else {
		$('#mainNavbar').css('position','relative');
		$('.circle.social').fadeOut(0);	
		$('#mainNavbar').removeClass('scrolled');
	}

}
window.onscroll = scrollFunction;
window.onresize = scrollFunction;
</script> 
  <script>

var isVisible = 0;
$(document).click(function(e) {	
  if($(e.target).closest('#searchButton').length==0 && e.target.id!="searchFieldSticky" && $(e.target).closest('#searchFieldSticky').length==0){ 	
  	$('#searchFieldSticky').fadeOut(300);
  	isVisible=0;
  } 
  $( "#codecs" ).mouseleave(function() {
	$( "#codecsMenu" ).fadeOut(0);
	$( "#codecs" ).removeClass('selectedMenu');
	});
  $( "#tools" ).mouseleave(function() {
	$( "#toolsMenu" ).fadeOut(0);
	$( "#tools" ).removeClass('selectedMenu');
	});
});
$( document ).ready(function() {
	$('#myFieldSticky').click(function(e) {
		$('#searchFieldSticky').css('display', 'block');
	});
});
$( window ).resize(function() {
	if(isVisible==1)
		$('#searchFieldSticky').css('display', 'block');

});
$( window ).scroll(function() {
	if(isVisible==1)
		$('#searchFieldSticky').css('display', 'block');
	console.log(isVisible);
});
function toggle(){
	//$('#searchFieldSticky').fadeToggle(300);
	if( isVisible==1 ){
		isVisible = 0;
		$('#searchFieldSticky').css('display', 'none');

	}
	else 	{
		isVisible = 1;
		$('#searchFieldSticky').css('display', 'block');
	}
}

function toggleMenu(id){
	$('#'+id).fadeToggle(0);
	$('#'+id.replace('Menu', '')).addClass('selectedMenu');
}
function toggleMobileMenu(name){
	$('.'+name).fadeToggle(0);
}

</script> 
  <style>

/*@import "compass/css3";*/
@import url(http://weloveiconfonts.com/api/?family=entypo);

/* entypo */
[class*="entypo-"]:before {
  font-family: 'entypo', sans-serif;
}
div[class*="entypo-"]{
	line-height: 17px;
    padding-left: 2px;
    font-size: 18px;
}

/* FONT */
/* BEGIN Light */
@font-face {
  font-family: 'Open Sans';
  src: url("./css/fonts/Light/OpenSans-Light.eot?v=1.1.0");
  src: url("./css/fonts/Light/OpenSans-Light.eot?#iefix&v=1.1.0") format("embedded-opentype"), url("./css/fonts/Light/OpenSans-Light.woff2?v=1.1.0") format("woff2"), url("./css/fonts/Light/OpenSans-Light.woff?v=1.1.0") format("woff"), url("./css/fonts/Light/OpenSans-Light.ttf?v=1.1.0") format("truetype"), url("./css/fonts/Light/OpenSans-Light.svg?v=1.1.0#Light") format("svg");
  font-weight: 300;
  font-style: normal; }
/* END Light */
/* BEGIN Light Italic */
@font-face {
  font-family: 'Open Sans';
  src: url("./css/fonts/LightItalic/OpenSans-LightItalic.eot?v=1.1.0");
  src: url("./css/fonts/LightItalic/OpenSans-LightItalic.eot?#iefix&v=1.1.0") format("embedded-opentype"), url("./css/fonts/LightItalic/OpenSans-LightItalic.woff2?v=1.1.0") format("woff2"), url("./css/fonts/LightItalic/OpenSans-LightItalic.woff?v=1.1.0") format("woff"), url("./css/fonts/LightItalic/OpenSans-LightItalic.ttf?v=1.1.0") format("truetype"), url("./css/fonts/LightItalic/OpenSans-LightItalic.svg?v=1.1.0#LightItalic") format("svg");
  font-weight: 300;
  font-style: italic; }
/* END Light Italic */
/* BEGIN Regular */
@font-face {
  font-family: 'Open Sans';
  src: url("./css/fonts/Regular/OpenSans-Regular.eot?v=1.1.0");
  src: url("./css/fonts/Regular/OpenSans-Regular.eot?#iefix&v=1.1.0") format("embedded-opentype"), url("./css/fonts/Regular/OpenSans-Regular.woff2?v=1.1.0") format("woff2"), url("./css/fonts/Regular/OpenSans-Regular.woff?v=1.1.0") format("woff"), url("./css/fonts/Regular/OpenSans-Regular.ttf?v=1.1.0") format("truetype"), url("./css/fonts/Regular/OpenSans-Regular.svg?v=1.1.0#Regular") format("svg");
  font-weight: normal;
  font-style: normal; }
/* END Regular */
/* BEGIN Italic */
@font-face {
  font-family: 'Open Sans';
  src: url("./css/fonts/Italic/OpenSans-Italic.eot?v=1.1.0");
  src: url("./css/fonts/Italic/OpenSans-Italic.eot?#iefix&v=1.1.0") format("embedded-opentype"), url("./css/fonts/Italic/OpenSans-Italic.woff2?v=1.1.0") format("woff2"), url("./css/fonts/Italic/OpenSans-Italic.woff?v=1.1.0") format("woff"), url("./css/fonts/Italic/OpenSans-Italic.ttf?v=1.1.0") format("truetype"), url("./css/fonts/Italic/OpenSans-Italic.svg?v=1.1.0#Italic") format("svg");
  font-weight: normal;
  font-style: italic; }
/* END Italic */
/* BEGIN Semibold */
@font-face {
  font-family: 'Open Sans';
  src: url("./css/fonts/Semibold/OpenSans-Semibold.eot?v=1.1.0");
  src: url("./css/fonts/Semibold/OpenSans-Semibold.eot?#iefix&v=1.1.0") format("embedded-opentype"), url("./css/fonts/Semibold/OpenSans-Semibold.woff2?v=1.1.0") format("woff2"), url("./css/fonts/Semibold/OpenSans-Semibold.woff?v=1.1.0") format("woff"), url("./css/fonts/Semibold/OpenSans-Semibold.ttf?v=1.1.0") format("truetype"), url("./css/fonts/Semibold/OpenSans-Semibold.svg?v=1.1.0#Semibold") format("svg");
  font-weight: 600;
  font-style: normal; }
/* END Semibold */
/* BEGIN Semibold Italic */

/* BEGIN Bold */
@font-face {
  font-family: 'Open Sans';
  src: url("./css/fonts/Bold/OpenSans-Bold.eot?v=1.1.0");

  font-weight: bold;
  font-style: normal; }
/* END Bold */

  <script>
  (function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){
  (i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),
  m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)
  })(window,document,'script','//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');

  ga('create', 'UA-320719-1', 'auto');
  ga('send', 'pageview');

</script>
  <!-- end google analytics--> 
  <!-- BuySellAds Ad Code --> 
  <script type="text/javascript">

(function(){

  var bsa = document.createElement('script');

     bsa.type = 'text/javascript';

     bsa.async = true;

     bsa.src = 'http://s3.buysellads.com/ac/bsa.js';

  (document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0]||document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0]).appendChild(bsa);

})();

</script> 
  <!-- End BuySellAds Ad Code --> 
  <div id="fb-root"></div> 
  <script>(function(d, s, id) {

  var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];

  if (d.getElementById(id)) return;

  js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id;

  js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/all.js#xfbml=1&appId=128596287292726";

  fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);

}(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));</script>

             <li><a href="/software/audio_encoders.htm" title="AUDIO ENCODERS"> ? AUDIO ENCODERS </a></li>

             <li><a href="/software/codec_identifiers.htm" title="CODEC IDENTIFIERS"> ? CODEC IDENTIFIERS </a></li>

        <div id="searchFieldSticky" style="display: none;"> 
         <div id="fieldContainerSticky"> 
          <div id="gsearchFormSticky"> 
           <form action="http://www.free-codecs.com/search.php" id="cse-search-box"> 
            <div id="googleSearchSticky"> 
             <input type="hidden" name="cx" value="partner-pub-7595495923317249:3csgxgupts4"> 
             <input type="hidden" name="cof" value="FORID:11"> 
             <input type="hidden" name="ie" value="ISO-8859-1"> 
             <input type="text" name="q" id="myFieldSticky"> 
            </div> 
            <input type="image" src="/images/search_button.png" name="sa" value="Search" id="mySearchSticky" onmouseover="this.src = '/images/search_button_hover.png'" onmouseout="this.src = '/images/search_button.png'"> 
            <script async type="text/javascript" src="http://www.google.com/cse/brand?form=cse-search-box&amp;lang=en"></script> 
           </form> 
          </div> 
          <div class="clearLeft"></div> 
         </div> 
        </div> 
        <!-- end search --> 
        <div id="mobileMenu"> 
         <div id="trigger">
          <span> Menu</span> 
          <img src="images/mobileMenu.png"> 
         </div> 
        </div> 
        <div class="clearLeft"></div> 
       </div> 
       <div class="clearBoth"></div> 
       <ul id="mobileList"> 
        <li class="wSubmenu"> <a href="#"> CODECS </a> 
         <ul class="submenu"> 
          <li><a href="audio_codecs.htm" title="Audio Codecs"> Audio Codecs </a></li> 
          <li><a href="video_codecs.htm" title="Video Codecs"> Video Codecs </a></li> 
          <li><a href="codec_packs.htm" title="Codec Packs"> Codec Packs </a></li> 
         </ul> </li> 
        <li class="wSubmenu"> <a href="#"> TOOLS </a> 
         <ul class="submenu"> 
          <li><a href="/software/audio_editors.htm" title="Audio Editors"> Audio Editors </a></li> 
          <li><a href="/software/audio_encoders.htm" title="Audio Encoders"> Audio Encoders </a></li> 
          <li><a href="/software/dvd_backup.htm" title="Blu-ray/DVD Backup"> Blu-ray/DVD Backup </a></li> 
          <li><a href="/software/burning_tools.htm" title="Burning Tools"> Burning Tools </a></li> 
          <li><a href="/software/codec_identifiers.htm" title="Codec Identifiers"> Codec Identifiers </a></li> 
          <li><a href="/software/digital_tv.htm" title="Digital Radio &amp; TV"> Digital Radio &amp; TV </a></li> 
          <li><a href="/software/dvd_authoring.htm" title="DVD Authoring"> DVD Authoring </a></li> 
          <li><a href="/software/fix_repair_tools.htm" title="Fix/Repair Tools"> Fix/Repair Tools </a></li> 
          <li><a href="/software/graphics.htm" title="Graphics"> Graphics </a></li> 
          <li><a href="/software/media_management.htm" title="Media Management"> Media Management </a></li> 
          <li><a href="/software/media_players.htm" title="Media Players"> Media Players </a></li> 
          <li><a href="/software/cd_dvd_utilities.htm" title="Media Utilities"> Media Utilities </a></li> 
          <li><a href="/software/mobile_devices.htm" title="Mobile Devices"> Mobile Devices </a></li> 
          <li><a href="/software/other_tools.htm" title="Other Tools"> Other Tools </a></li> 
          <li><a href="/software/subtitle_tools.htm" title="Subtitle Tools"> Subtitle Tools </a></li> 
          <li><a href="/software/video_editors.htm" title="Video Editors"> Video Editors </a></li> 
          <li><a href="/software/video_encoders.htm" title="Video Encoders"> Video Encoders </a></li> 
          <li><a href="/software.htm" title="All Tools"> All Tools </a></li> 
         </ul> </li> 
        <li> <a href="/Guides.htm" title="Guides">GUIDES</a></li> 
        <li> <a href="http://www.codecs.com/forum" title="Forum"> FORUM </a> </li>

   <div id="contentWrapper"> 
    <div id="mainContent"> 
     <div id="mainContentTop"> 
      <div id="mainContentTopMiddle"> 
       <ul id="breadcrumbs"> 
        <li class="first"><a href="http://www.free-codecs.com/" title="Home">Home</a></li> 
        <li><h1 style="font-size: inherit; font-weight: inherit;">Codec Packs</h1></li> 
       </ul> 
       <div class="clearLeft"></div> 
      </div> 
      <div id="mainContentTopRight"></div> 
      <div class="clearLeft"></div> 
      <div id="categoryNameDesc"> 
       <p id="categoryDesc">Download latest audio &amp; video codec packs.</p> 
      </div> 
     </div> 
     <div class="paginationWrapper"> 
      <div> 
       <ul class="pagination">
        <li><a class="currentPage" href="#" onclick="return false;">1</a></li>
        <li><a href="codec_packs2.htm" title="Page 2">2</a></li>
       </ul> 
      </div> 
      <div class="sortOptionsWraper"> 
       <form class="sortOptions" action="" method="post"> 
        <div class="arrow"></div> 
        <a class="first-option" href="#alphabetical">alphabetical</a> 
        <a href="#newest">newest</a> 
        <a href="#freeware">freeware</a> 
        <a href="#shareware">shareware</a> 
        <input type="hidden" class="sortByValue" name="sortBy" value=""> 
       </form> 
       <span class="listLabel">Sort by:</span> 
       <div class="clearBoth"></div> 
      </div> 
      <div class="clearBoth"></div> 
     </div> 
     <div id="listing"> 
      <div class="listElementOdd"> 
       <img src="/images/bullet.png" alt="bullet" class="bullet"> 
       <h2><a style="color: #b7afbf;" href="download/ACE_Mega_CoDecS_Pack.htm" title="ACE Mega CodecS Pack 6.03 - Professional Edition">ACE Mega CodecS Pack 6.03 - Professional Edition</a></h2>
       <!--<sup class=""></sup>--> 
       <p class="softwareListData"> <span class="label-obsolete">OBSOLETE</span> Updated: 21 Dec 2004 | License: Freeware | Size: 49.2MB | Downloads: 6885343 </p> 
       <p class="sft-lead">This is the lastest and greatest release of famous ACE Mega CoDecS Pack. [Important! ACE Mega CodecS Pack's development was discontinued.]</p> 
      </div> 
      <div class="listElementEven"> 
       <img src="/images/bullet.png" alt="bullet" class="bullet"> 
       <h2><a href="download/advanced_codecs.htm" title="ADVANCED Codecs 8.2.1">ADVANCED Codecs 8.2.1</a></h2>
       <!--<sup class=""></sup>--> 
       <p class="softwareListData"> <span class="label-fresh">FRESH</span> Updated: 8 Sep 2017 | License: Freeware | Size: 55.4MB | Downloads: 187145 </p> 
       <p class="sft-lead">ADVANCED Codecs (formerly known as Windows 7 Codecs) is an audio and video codec package for Microsoft Windows 7, 8 and 10 operating systems.</p> 
      </div> 
      <div class="listElementOdd"> 
       <img src="/images/bullet.png" alt="bullet" class="bullet"> 
       <h2><a href="download/amd_crimson.htm" title="AMD Crimson ReLive 17.9.1">AMD Crimson ReLive 17.9.1</a></h2>
       <!--<sup class=""></sup>--> 
       <p class="softwareListData"> <span class="label-fresh">FRESH</span> Updated: 9 Sep 2017 | License: Freeware | Size: ~280MB | Downloads: 156421 </p> 
       <p class="sft-lead">AMD Crimson updates are focused on improving graphics performance, including enhancements for popular <a href="./download/DirectX.htm" title="Download DirectX">DirectX</a>, Mantle and OpenGL game titles.</p> 
      </div> 
      <div class="listElementEven"> 
       <img src="/images/bullet.png" alt="bullet" class="bullet"> 
       <h2><a style="color: #b7afbf;" href="download/AVI_Codec_Pack.htm" title="AVI Codec Pack Plus 2.8 and Lite 3.2">AVI Codec Pack Plus 2.8 and Lite 3.2</a></h2>
       <!--<sup class=""></sup>--> 
       <p class="softwareListData"> <span class="label-obsolete">OBSOLETE</span> Updated: 23 May 2005 | License: Freeware | Size: 3.34MB | Downloads: 845857 </p> 
       <p class="sft-lead">AVI Codec Pack is a collection of codecs provided by Streaming Media Tech.</p> 
      </div> 
      <div class="listElementOdd"> 
       <img src="/images/bullet.png" alt="bullet" class="bullet"> 
       <h2><a style="color: #b7afbf;" href="download/BoliGego_Codec_Manager.htm" title="BoliGego Codec Manager 1.0.4.3">BoliGego Codec Manager 1.0.4.3</a></h2>
       <!--<sup class=""></sup>--> 
       <p class="softwareListData"> <span class="label-obsolete">OBSOLETE</span> Updated: 2 Jan 2006 | License: Freeware | Size: 13.1MB | Downloads: 64468 </p> 
       <p class="sft-lead">BoliGego Codec Manager is a flexible collection of the most used codecs. [Important! The development of BoliGego Codec Manager was discontinued.]</p> 
      </div> 
      <div class="listElementEven"> 
       <img src="/images/bullet.png" alt="bullet" class="bullet"> 
       <h2><a style="color: #b7afbf;" href="download/Codec.htm" title="Codec 8.4">Codec 8.4</a></h2>
       <!--<sup class=""></sup>--> 
       <p class="softwareListData"> <span class="label-obsolete">OBSOLETE</span> Updated: 10 Jan 2010 | License: Freeware | Size: 4.52MB | Downloads: 735039 </p> 
       <p class="sft-lead">One of the most advanced codec packs with essential codecs to play many popular media formats. </p> 
      </div> 
      <div class="listElementOdd"> 
       <img src="/images/bullet.png" alt="bullet" class="bullet"> 
       <h2><a style="color: #b7afbf;" href="download/Codec_Installation_Package_for_Windows_Media_Player_6_4.htm" title="Codec Installation Package for Windows Media Player 6.4">Codec Installation Package for Windows Media Player 6.4</a></h2>
       <!--<sup class=""></sup>--> 
       <p class="softwareListData"> <span class="label-obsolete">OBSOLETE</span> Updated: 3 Sep 2004 | License: Freeware | Size: 1.26KB | Downloads: 93374 </p> 
       <p class="sft-lead">Download this pack if you cannot play content by using the Windows Media Video 9 or Windows Media Audio 9 Voice codecs from a Player embedded in a Web page.</p> 
      </div> 
      <div class="listElementEven"> 
       <img src="/images/bullet.png" alt="bullet" class="bullet"> 
       <h2><a style="color: #b7afbf;" href="download/Codec_Installation_Package_for_Windows_Media_Player_7_8_9_10.htm" title="Codec Installation Package for Windows Media Player 7.1 or later">Codec Installation Package for Windows Media Player 7.1 or later</a></h2>
       <!--<sup class=""></sup>--> 
       <p class="softwareListData"> <span class="label-obsolete">OBSOLETE</span> Updated: 3 Sep 2004 | License: Freeware | Size: 1.35MB | Downloads: 733617 </p> 
       <p class="sft-lead">This package can be used as an alternative to automatically downloading Windows Media Codecs, or to correct problems experienced with previously-downloaded codecs.</p> 
      </div> 
      <div class="listElementOdd"> 
       <img src="/images/bullet.png" alt="bullet" class="bullet"> 
       <h2><a style="color: #b7afbf;" href="download/Codec_Pack_All_in_1.htm" title="Codec Pack All in 1 6.0.3.0">Codec Pack All in 1 6.0.3.0</a></h2>
       <!--<sup class=""></sup>--> 
       <p class="softwareListData"> <span class="label-obsolete">OBSOLETE</span> Updated: 22 Jan 2006 | License: Freeware | Size: 9.25MB | Downloads: 14762545 </p> 
       <p class="sft-lead">Codec Pack All in 1 is a collection of codecs which allows you to play DivX movies and to adjust their quality as well.</p> 
      </div> 
      <div class="listElementEven"> 
       <img src="/images/bullet.png" alt="bullet" class="bullet"> 
       <h2><a href="download/Cole2k_Media_Codec_Pack.htm" title="Cole2k Media Codec Pack 8.0.6">Cole2k Media Codec Pack 8.0.6</a></h2>
       <!--<sup class=""></sup>--> 
       <p class="softwareListData"> Updated: 5 Nov 2015 | License: Freeware | Size: 35.4MB | Downloads: 570474 </p> 
       <p class="sft-lead">Cole2k Media Codec Pack is a collection of codecs, filters and splitters available in two versions, Standard and Advanced.</p> 
      </div> 
      <div class="listElementOdd"> 
       <img src="/images/bullet.png" alt="bullet" class="bullet"> 
       <h2><a href="download/Cole2k_Media_Nero_Audio_Plugin_Pack.htm" title="Cole2k Media Nero Audio Plugin Pack 1.5.4">Cole2k Media Nero Audio Plugin Pack 1.5.4</a></h2>
       <!--<sup class=""></sup>--> 
       <p class="softwareListData"> Updated: 25 Nov 2015 | License: Freeware | Size: 4.3MB | Downloads: 155863 </p> 
       <p class="sft-lead">Cole2k Media is a plugin pack for <a href="./download/Nero_Burning_ROM.htm" title="Download Nero Burning Rom">Nero</a>, enabling the well-known software to burn some additional formats (that it would not normally support) to audio discs.</p> 
      </div> 
      <div class="listElementEven"> 
       <img src="/images/bullet.png" alt="bullet" class="bullet"> 
       <h2><a href="download/Combined_Community_Codec_Pack.htm" title="Combined Community Codec Pack (CCCP) 2015.10.25 beta">Combined Community Codec Pack (CCCP) 2015.10.25 beta</a></h2>
       <!--<sup class=""></sup>--> 
       <p class="softwareListData"> Updated: 27 Oct 2015 | License: Freeware | Size: 10MB | Downloads: 840920 </p> 
       <p class="sft-lead">CCCP (Combined Community Codec Pack) has been developed by anime experts whose aim was to offer great image quality while using the lowest amount of resources possible.</p> 
      </div> 
      <div class="listElementOdd"> 
       <img src="/images/bullet.png" alt="bullet" class="bullet"> 
       <h2><a style="color: #b7afbf;" href="download/DefilerPak.htm" title="DefilerPak 1.22">DefilerPak 1.22</a></h2>
       <!--<sup class=""></sup>--> 
       <p class="softwareListData"> <span class="label-obsolete">OBSOLETE</span> Updated: 19 Dec 2005 | License: Freeware | Size: 5.55MB | Downloads: 44954 </p> 
       <p class="sft-lead">The DefilerPak is a minimalist collection of video and audio codecs.</p> 
      </div> 
      <div class="listElementEven"> 
       <img src="/images/bullet.png" alt="bullet" class="bullet"> 
       <h2><a style="color: #b7afbf;" href="download/DirectShow_FilterPack.htm" title="DirectShow FilterPack 5.1">DirectShow FilterPack 5.1</a></h2>
       <!--<sup class=""></sup>--> 
       <p class="softwareListData"> <span class="label-obsolete">OBSOLETE</span> Updated: 4 Mar 2012 | License: Freeware | Size: 4.13MB | Downloads: 1232617 </p> 
       <p class="sft-lead">DirectShow FilterPack is a lightweight collection of filters which allows you to play the most popular multimedia formats.</p> 
      </div> 
      <div class="listElementOdd"> 
       <img src="/images/bullet.png" alt="bullet" class="bullet"> 
       <h2><a style="color: #b7afbf;" href="download/DivX_Total_Pack.htm" title="DivX Total Pack 2.3">DivX Total Pack 2.3</a></h2>
       <!--<sup class=""></sup>--> 
       <p class="softwareListData"> <span class="label-obsolete">OBSOLETE</span> Updated: 16 Sep 2005 | License: Freeware | Size: 5.3MB | Downloads: 330706 </p> 
       <p class="sft-lead">DivX Total Pack makes it possible to play DivX and Xvid video and audio streams no matter what version of the Windows operating system you use.</p> 
      </div> 
      <div class="listElementEven"> 
       <img src="/images/bullet.png" alt="bullet" class="bullet"> 
       <h2><a style="color: #b7afbf;" href="download/DJBCP_Codec_Pack.htm" title="DJBCP Codec Pack 5.1.0.1">DJBCP Codec Pack 5.1.0.1</a></h2>
       <!--<sup class=""></sup>--> 
       <p class="softwareListData"> <span class="label-obsolete">OBSOLETE</span> Updated: 5 Dec 2005 | License: Freeware | Size: 19.3MB | Downloads: 305918 </p> 
       <p class="sft-lead">DJBCP Codec Pack is a collection of codecs allowing you to play and to handle video files on your computer. [Important! The development of DJBCP Codec Pack was discontinued.]</p> 
      </div> 
      <div class="listElementOdd"> 
       <img src="/images/bullet.png" alt="bullet" class="bullet"> 
       <h2><a href="download/foobar2000_Free_Encoder_Pack.htm" title="foobar2000 Free Encoder Pack 2017-06-27">foobar2000 Free Encoder Pack 2017-06-27</a></h2>
       <!--<sup class=""></sup>--> 
       <p class="softwareListData"> <span class="label-fresh">FRESH</span> Updated: 27 Jun 2017 | License: Freeware | Size: 1.6MB | Downloads: 9801 </p> 
       <p class="sft-lead">Foobar2000 Free Encoder Pack is a piece of software including all natively supported free encoder binaries which are used by the <a href="./download/foobar2000.htm" title="Download foobar2000">foobar2000</a> audio player.</p> 
      </div> 
      <div class="listElementEven"> 
       <img src="/images/bullet.png" alt="bullet" class="bullet"> 
       <h2><a style="color: #b7afbf;" href="download/Gordian_Knot_Codec_Pack.htm" title="Gordian Knot Codec Pack 1.9">Gordian Knot Codec Pack 1.9</a></h2>
       <!--<sup class=""></sup>--> 
       <p class="softwareListData"> <span class="label-obsolete">OBSOLETE</span> Updated: 22 Dec 2004 | License: Freeware | Size: 11.4MB | Downloads: 433873 </p> 
       <p class="sft-lead">The Gordian Knot Codec Pack offers you extra software tools for the Gordian Knot Rip Pack.</p> 
      </div> 
      <div class="listElementOdd"> 
       <img src="/images/bullet.png" alt="bullet" class="bullet"> 
       <h2><a style="color: #b7afbf;" href="download/Hotwire_Codec_Bundle.htm" title="Hotwire Codec Bundle 1.0">Hotwire Codec Bundle 1.0</a></h2>
       <!--<sup class=""></sup>--> 
       <p class="softwareListData"> <span class="label-obsolete">OBSOLETE</span> Updated: 8 Feb 2006 | License: Freeware | Size: 1.27MB | Downloads: 17981 </p> 
       <p class="sft-lead">Hotwire Codec Bundle is a slim software bundle that unites the most popular audio and video codecs.</p> 
      </div> 
      <div class="listElementEven"> 
       <img src="/images/bullet.png" alt="bullet" class="bullet"> 
       <h2><a href="download/K_Lite_Codec_Pack.htm" title="K-Lite Codec Pack 13.5.2">K-Lite Codec Pack 13.5.2</a></h2>
       <!--<sup class=""></sup>--> 
       <p class="softwareListData"> <span class="label-fresh">FRESH</span> Updated: 10 Sep 2017 | License: Freeware | Size: 44.2MB | Downloads: 254343549 </p> 
       <p class="sft-lead">K-Lite Codec Pack is a comprehensive selection of codecs which guarantees that you will be able to play almost any video or audio file.</p> 
      </div> 
      <div class="listElementOdd"> 
       <img src="/images/bullet.png" alt="bullet" class="bullet"> 
       <h2><a style="color: #b7afbf;" href="download/K-Lite_Codec_Pack_64-bit.htm" title="K-Lite Codec Pack 64-bit 9.9.9">K-Lite Codec Pack 64-bit 9.9.9</a></h2>
       <!--<sup class=""></sup>--> 
       <p class="softwareListData"> <span class="label-obsolete">OBSOLETE</span> Updated: 24 Jun 2013 | License: Freeware | Size: 11.8MB | Downloads: 3553825 </p> 
       <p class="sft-lead">K-Lite Codec Pack 64-bit is a collection of 64-bit DirectShow filters that will enable you to play the most popular media formats. [Important! K-Lite Codec Pack 64-bit's development was discontinued.]</p> 
      </div> 
      <div class="listElementEven"> 
       <img src="/images/bullet.png" alt="bullet" class="bullet"> 
       <h2><a href="download/K-Lite_Codec_Pack_Update.htm" title="K-Lite Codec Pack Update 13.5.3">K-Lite Codec Pack Update 13.5.3</a></h2>
       <!--<sup class=""></sup>--> 
       <p class="softwareListData"> <span class="label-fresh">FRESH</span> Updated: 15 Sep 2017 | License: Freeware | Size: 17.7MB | Downloads: 1577787 </p> 
       <p class="sft-lead">K-Lite Codec Pack is a collection of DirectShow filters, VFW/ACM codecs, and tools. Codecs and DirectShow filters are needed for encoding and decoding audio and video formats.</p> 
      </div> 
      <div class="listElementOdd"> 
       <img src="/images/bullet.png" alt="bullet" class="bullet"> 
       <h2><a href="download/K_Lite_Mega_Codec_Pack.htm" title="K-Lite Mega Codec Pack 13.5.2">K-Lite Mega Codec Pack 13.5.2</a></h2>
       <!--<sup class=""></sup>--> 
       <p class="softwareListData"> <span class="label-fresh">FRESH</span> Updated: 10 Sep 2017 | License: Freeware | Size: 43.9MB | Downloads: 68882486 </p> 
       <p class="sft-lead">K-Lite Mega Codec Pack is a free collection of codecs that allows you to play all your video files and online media contents.</p> 
      </div> 
      <div class="listElementEven"> 
       <img src="/images/bullet.png" alt="bullet" class="bullet"> 
       <h2><a style="color: #b7afbf;" href="download/Lazy_Man_MKV.htm" title="Lazy Man's MKV 1.0.1 alpha 8">Lazy Man's MKV 1.0.1 alpha 8</a></h2>
       <!--<sup class=""></sup>--> 
       <p class="softwareListData"> <span class="label-obsolete">OBSOLETE</span> Updated: 12 May 2006 | License: Freeware | Size: 1.19MB | Downloads: 1136119 </p> 
       <p class="sft-lead">Lazy Man's MKV is a free pack of filters, targeted mainly to decode Matroska (MKV) files and it's just perfect for those who want to avoid large codec packs. It installs only 3 DirectShow filters.</p> 
      </div> 
      <div class="listElementOdd"> 
       <img src="/images/bullet.png" alt="bullet" class="bullet"> 
       <h2><a style="color: #b7afbf;" href="download/Matroska_Pack.htm" title="Matroska Pack 1.1.2">Matroska Pack 1.1.2</a></h2>
       <!--<sup class=""></sup>--> 
       <p class="softwareListData"> <span class="label-obsolete">OBSOLETE</span> Updated: 1 May 2006 | License: Freeware | Size: 3.8MB | Downloads: 4398135 </p> 
       <p class="sft-lead">Matroska Packs are collections of codecs allowing you to view Matroska media files and the most popular video formats using any DirectShow media player.</p> 
      </div> 
     </div>

       </dd> 
       <dd class="subList"> 
        <a href="/software/other_tools.htm" title="Other Tools"> Other Tools </a> 
        <div class="line"> 
        </div> 
       </dd> 
      </dl> 
      <dl class="sectionList half" id="categList2"> 
       <dd> 
        <a href="/video_codecs.htm" title="Video Codecs"> Video Codecs </a>
